body:
Hello I have been unable to open the QT on my MAC for a couple weeks and am not a programmer and do not know if this error has been addressed else where in the forum.  Apologies if it has.  Can someone please check it out.  
A "problem report for Bitcoin-QT" box pops up with the following error (sorry it's so long):
